title: Office 2013 64 en 32 BIT Updated tot Januari 2014
description:
******************************
Wat is Office 2013?
******************************


Office 2013 64 en 32 BIT Updated tot Januari 2014 by Unattended 


Office 2013 is more "cloud-based" than previous versions. This is notable as the default save location is the user's SkyDrive. Also, Microsoft is hoping that users will get Office 2013 through Office 365 subscriptions.

Microsoft Office 2013 includes updated support for ISO/IEC 29500, the International Standard version of Office Open XML (OOXML) file format as well as OASIS Open Document Format 1.2, which Office 2013 can read and write.

Additionally, Office 2013 provides full read, write, and edit support for ISO32000 (PDF). Microsoft Office 2013 also supports Office Open XML Strict, a format which Microsoft has submitted to the ISO for interoperability with other office suites, and to aid adoption in the public sector.

New features include a new read mode in Microsoft Word, a presentation mode in Microsoft PowerPoint and improved touch and inking in all of the Office programs. Microsoft Word can also insert video and audio from online sources as well as the capability to broadcast documents on the Web. Word and PowerPoint also have bookmark-like features which sync the position of the document between different computers.



Other features of Office 2013 include:

Flatter look of the Ribbon interface and subtle animations when typing or selecting (Word and Excel)
A new visualization for scheduled tasks in Microsoft Outlook
New Start Experience [clarification needed]
New graphical options in Microsoft Word [further explanation needed]
New alignment lines when moving objects [clarification needed What are they ? Were there "old aligment lines" ?]
Online picture support with content from Office.com, Bing.com and Flickr [clarification needed What kind of support ?]
Resume Reading in Word and PowerPoint [further explanation needed]
New slide designs, animations and transitions in PowerPoint 2013
Support forandin Outlook
Support for Skype and Yammer [further explanation needed]
Excel 2013 supports new model limits.


******************************
Wat wordt er geinstalleerd?
******************************

Word
Excel
Powerpoint
Outlook


******************************
Hoe te installeren?
******************************

***Mount de ISO met Daemon Tools***

***Klik op office 64 BIT om Office voor Windows 64 BIT te installeren****

***Klik op office 32 BIT om Office voor Windows 32 BIT te installeren****

***Klik op 64 BIT Check om te kijken of u een 64 of 32 Bits systeem heeft***

***Het enige wat u hoeft te doen is op de knop installeren te klikken zodat office installeert, of op aanpassen als u Meerdere Producten wilt installeren. Als de setup klaar is, wordt automatisch de crack geinstalleerd, het kan heel even duren voordat de crack start***

***Geeft de crack aan dat hij .NetFramework mist, installeer dan .NetFramework 4.5.1 die bij deze installatie zit***

***Deze versie is helemaal Up-To-Date tot en met Januari 2014***

***Het kan zijn dat hij enkele updates niet pakt tijdens de installatie, installeer dan de resterende updates via windows update zelf***
